snippet: The success of Andy Murray and the emerging Laura Robson at the United States Open adds hope for those awaiting the first homegrown Wimbledon singles champion since 1977.
abstract: Success of Britons Andy Murray and the emerging Laura Robson at the United States Open, adds hope for those awaiting the first homegrown Wimbledon singles champion since 1977.
lead_paragraph: The success of Andy Murray and the emerging Laura Robson at the United States Open adds hope for those awaiting the first homegrown Wimbledon singles champion since 1977.

headline.seo: Andy Murray and Laura Robson Emerge at U.S. Open as British Wimbledon Contenders
headline.main: Success at Open Bodes Well for Britons’ Chances at Wimbledon
headline.print_headline: Success at Open Bodes Well for Britons’ Chances at Wimbledon
